system.effect: A solid blow to the leg sends currents of agony coursing through the target. The target suffers 1 level of Fatigue and is knocked Prone. Reduce his Movement by half (rounding up) for [[1d10]] rounds.

description.value:
Energy Damage to Leg (Severity 3)

A solid blow to the leg sends currents of agony coursing through the target. The target suffers 1 level of Fatigue and is knocked Prone. Reduce his Movement by half (rounding up) for [[1d10]] rounds.
